MemoryInfobox.name: Effects of the Dead
MemoryInfobox.description: 'An athlete, a cousin of Brasidas of Sparta although her name has been forgotten, asked a guilt-ridden Kassandra to help her in claiming Brasidas' effects from a Spartan Commander.'

General_Description: '''Effects of the Dead''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Following the [[Battle of Amphipolis]] and [[Brasidas]]' death, his cousin reached out to Kassandra.
Section_Dialogue:
While in [[Makedonia]], Kassandra noticed a note directed at her on the [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''The ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]'' who worked with Brasidas - I need your help. Others need not apply.'' Intrigued, Kassandra sought out the athlete and adressed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm here about the job you posted. What's going on?'' *'''Woman:''' ''You! Eagle Bearer, you were a great friend of General Brasidas of Sparta, were you not?'' |-|We knew each other, but weren't close.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I knew Brasidas, but we did not see eye to eye on a lot of things.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Oh... That is your loss. Brasidas was my cousin, and he was the most wonderful man. You would have been lucky to call him your friend.'' (Quest failed.) |-|Brasidas and I had our adventures.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Brasidas and I worked together a few times.'' *'''Woman:''' ''I knew it! Brasidas was my cousin and the most wonderful man I ever knew!'' |-|Lie - We were great friends.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Brasidas and I were very close, yes.'' *'''Woman:''' ''I knew it! He only ever said wonderful things about you. He was my cousin, you know.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Is that so...'' *'''Woman:''' ''I'd like to return his effects to his family, but a Spartan commander is holding onto them... tightly. As his best friend, you must know how important it is for his family to receive closure.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''And you're asking me to get it for you?'' *'''Woman:''' ''Yes, I need it back at all costs.'' (Accept - I'll bring it to you.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''You can count on me.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Good, get this done quickly.'' *'''Kassandra:''' Chaire. Kassandra sought out the bag of Brasidas' effects in a nearby fort, and then returned to the athlete. *'''Woman:''' ''Tell me it's been handled,'' misthios. *'''Kassandra:''' ''It's all yours.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Job well done, mercenary. Here, this is yours.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Happy to help.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the athlete recover Brasidas' effects, and was rewarded for this.
Section_Trivia: *This impact quest is triggered by completing the [[We Will Rise]]. Specifics are unknown.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
